Your resistance has been for naught. Your She-Ra has abandoned you. All that is left for your world is a terrible and eternal night.
Take us to Adora. Now!
She's too far away by now. We'd never reach her in time.
No. Use your magic. I know you have more power than you're letting on.
It doesn't work that way, Catra!
You've done it before! When you abandoned me in the Fright Zone. And you've always been able to track us our whole lives. So, do something good with it and help me save Adora before it's too late!
Come here.
Adora! Adora!
Catra?
Where's Adora?
She...She left us. She's headed to the Heart on her own.
Of course she's gone! That's what she does, isn't it?
Catra, what is going on?
Horde Prime is onto you. He's hacking into the planet. All of this is from him.
He's gonna take the Heart.
That's not all. He's got Entrapta.
If Prime has Entrapta, that means the other princesses are still chipped. We have to get back up there.
We can't just leave Adora!
I'll stay. I'll find her.
Catra...
I can't lose her again, okay? I promised her a long time ago that I'd look out for her. It's time I made good on that.
Take care of her, Horde scum.
That's the plan, Sparkles. And good luck.
The four of us don't need luck. We're the Best Friend Squad.
Get them there safe, okay?
Go help the Princesses! I'll handle the signal.
Bow...I love you. I love you.
I love you, too.
Be careful, okay?
Me? I'm always careful.
I'm going to save Etheria, no matter what it takes. Your sacrifice won't be in vain. I promise.
But at what cost? I never wanted to die. I sacrificed myself so you would never have to. Why are you doing this, Adora?
It's better this way. My friends will be safe. They'll be happy.
And you? What do you want when this is all over?
I...It doesn't matter. I'm She-Ra. This is what I'm supposed to do.
You're worth more than what you can give to other people. You deserve love, too. You're so close, Adora. Don't give up yet.
Mara? What's--?
Ah. Adora. So, this is where you've run to hide.
There's too many! We have to retreat!
Retreat where? We're totally surrounded.
Yeah!
Miss me?
Yes, but also, behind you!
Mermista. Horde Prime thinks he controls you. But I know you. And I'm gonna prove it to you with the power of shanty! Oh--Whoa! Downward!
You know, this is actually kind of nice. Doesn't it remind you of the first time we met? You also tried to kill me then.
Couldn't wait to sweep me off my feet?
Why are you like this?
Because I love you, dearest. And also, it's a good distraction.
Please forgive me for that when you're back to normal.
Uh, guys? Did anyone see where Scorpia went?
I'm gonna help Bow with the signal. Aunt Casta, can you--?
Hello, baby girl.
You're not here. You can't stop me.
How strange. I must have fought her, must have known her face. But I have no memory of it.
I've seen so many like her over the years. One by one, all their faces have been lost to oblivion. Just as yours will be.

A parting gift from the First Ones. Their old security system. Capable of taking out even one as strong as She-Ra. You will never make it to the Heart, Adora. Your own people made sure of that. Goodbye, my oldest enemy.
Hey, Adora.
Catra! You can't be here. It's too dangerous. Shadow Weaver?
Get Adora to the Heart. I'll take care of this thing.
Catra, no!
I'll catch up, ok? Get to the Heart.
No, no. Catra!
Dad. no!
What's wrong, baby girl? I've never felt better.
Scorpia, please! We're trying to save you.
Dad, please! It's me, it's Glimmer!
Oh, I know who you are. My daughter. The weakling. The failure. And so it ends. Pathetic. Alone. Weak.
Mom. No. I'm not.
My mother raised me to be brave. My friends taught me to be kind. And I'm stubborn. I get that from you. I will never stop fighting! And I won't lose another parent!
I love you, Dad.
I've got it!
Scorpia, it's okay.
Prime may have made you do a lot of things,but he can't turn you into something you're not. So, right now, all I need you to do is trust me.
Oh, my gosh, I am so sorry. Did I hurt you? I did not mean to do that.
Welcome back.
My device worked! I knew it would.
Deploy all clone battalions. Get this under control!

Hey, everyone. I'm Bow. Prime is probably trying to get his channel back. I have to make this quick. Prime's controlled the universe for a long time. Right now,we're the only thing standing in the way of him controlling it forever. You might be feeling hopeless. You might be thinking "We don't stand a chance." And maybe we don't. Prime's too strong. His army is too powerful. But that's not gonna stop us. We need to show Prime we're not afraid of him, because we have each other. And we have love. We can't give up. And if we go down, we go down together. We need you. All of you. It's time to take back our world. It's time to fight. For She-Ra, for our homes, for each other!
Put an end to this mockery. Destroy them all!
Oh, little sister. What a shame. I had such high hopes for you.
No. No, wait!
Don't lose your focus. We're so close.
Catra!
Adora, wait!
So brave, risking yourself for Adora. But it will make no difference. The Heart is almost mine, and when it is, your Adora will die.
So, tell me,little sister, was it worth it?
Shadow Weaver?
Take Adora and run!
What are you...?
I told you to run! Now, run!
Shadow Weaver, no! What are you doing?
Please, Catra. You need to make sure Adora reaches the Heart. The magic must be set free.
Stop it! It's going to kill you!
It's too late for me. But you, this is only the beginning for you. I am so proud of you, Catra.
No! No!
Catra?
You're welcome.
Come on. We have to go.
Yeah!
Impossible.
You can't control us. You don't understand what makes us strong. And that's why you'll never win.
The Heart of Etheria. We made it.
What is it? What's wrong?
I don't... I don't know. I can't transform. It's Prime's virus. It's keeping me from becoming She-Ra.
What does that mean? Is the Failsafe not going to work without her?
No. It'll work. Get as far away from here as you can. I have to do this next part on my own.
Adora, what is going to happen to you?
Without She-Ra, the magic will destroy me. I'm sorry, Catra. I'm so sorry. But there's no more time. It has to end here. I can still save everybody. It's okay. I'm ready.
No.
Catra...
No. I'm not leaving. Whatever happens, I am staying with you.
Adora?
No, no, no, no, no. No! No!
Ah. I can feel it. The Heart is mine!
You can't do this! The Heart's power is too unstable! It will take you and the whole universe with it!

I have had enough of this chatty little rebel. Dispose of her now. My dominion was perfect. Everything was as it should be. Everything was as it should be. And so it shall be again. Did you not hear me, little brother? Do it now.
I am not your brother. You made me in your image, but I am more than that. I gave myself a name, I made a life of my own. I made... a friend. I am Hordak, and, I defy your will.
You did it! I knew you could--
Ah, little brother. So it's true. You have been thoroughly corrupted. So be it.
No!
You have forced my hand. I will unleash The Heart, and so we shall die in cleansing flame together!
Whoo!
Glimmer!
Bow!
Rejoice, Etheria, for your end has finally come! You have chosen darkness, and so, into darkness you shall be plunged. The world shall end in fire.
Adora!
The Failsafe. It didn't work.
And when the ashes scatter, at last, there will be, peace!
Adora. Adora, stay awake!
I'm sorry.
Adora! Adora!
Just let me brush it!
No!
Don't let her touch me. She's gonna torture me.
Do you always have to be this dramatic?
Come on guys. If we are late to Scorpia's first ball she is going to kill us.
Fine! You're off the hook. This time.
You coming?
A beautiful wish. But there will be no future. Not for you.
Adora! Please! You have to wake up!
You can't give up. You have never given up on anything in your life. Not even on me.
So don't you dare start now!
It's too late. I've failed.
No! No!
I've got you. I'm not letting go.
Don't you get it? I love you. I always have. So please, just this once. Stay!
Stay.
You... love me?
You're such an idiot.
I love you too.
Cry, Etheria! Cry for Prime's mercy! There will be no comfort for you! All the universe will be consumed in undying flame!
Though all is reduced to rubble, Prime shall rise again. So it has been, and so it always shall be.
No. You're wrong. It's time for you to go.
I remember you.
Hordak! I'm so glad you're back! Oh, we have so much to talk about!
Glimmer?
Hi, Dad.
I... You... Hello. I'm your dad!
Dad.
Perfuma! Hi. Wow you look... you look great.
Hey, Scorpia. Look, I... Ooh, there it is!
You know I'm a hugger.
Princess hug!
I'm so glad you're here! Oh...
So are we all just, like, okay with this?
Look at us now. From capturing you to us now being buddies.
We did it!
This is so dope!
Ah. You'd be proud, Mara dearie.
Adora?
It's over. He's gone.
Good riddance.
So, what are we going to do now?
We can bring magic back to the universe. What do you guys say to one more Best Friends Squad road trip?
I'm in!
Obviously!
Of course I'm going with you, dummy.
Then let's do this. Together.
